name: Jun. 2018 Premium
description: Accompanied by nerdy Peco Peco and cute Poring, we are not away from the world of children. That’s right. The childlike innocence is still with us!! To appreciate the adventurers who have been supporting us for a long time, the famous Kafra Company specially launched a special small card in the form of a monthly magazine. Hold it and you will feel its magical power. It's practical and highly collectible.

name: Juno Adventure Chest
description: Open the box to receive guaranteed Colorful Shell, with a chance to receive Fiery Ember, Shining Holy Water, Fang of Garm, Ice Powder, Harpy’s Feather, Lava Gem Pet EXP Potion (S), Pet EXP Potion (M), Pet EXP Potion (L), etc.

name: Jur
description: A light Katars. It does not affect the user's action.

name: Jur [2]
description: A light Katars. It does not affect the user's action.

name: Kafra Blessing Giftbox
description: To appreciate all the adventurers, Kafra, Co. employees has prepared a delicate gift~ It is very useful.

name: Kafra Co. random item pack
chineseName: 卡普拉公司随机道具包

name: Kafra Gift
description: The pack can be opened after EP 2.0 Pet Lover is launched, to receive Lunatic Egg x1, Eclipsex1.

name: Kafra MVP Voucher I
description: After completing the Dísir Val quest, You can receive 1 Strengthening Food and 300000 Zeny.

name: Kafra MVP Voucher II
description: After completing the Dísir Val quest, You can receive 5 Strengthening Food and 12800001 Zeny.

name: Kafra MVP Voucher III
description: After completing the Dísir Val quest, You can receive 11 Strengthening Food and 32800002 Zeny.

name: Kafra MVP Voucher IV
description: After completing the Dísir Val quest, You can receive 22 Strengthening Food and 64800003 Zeny.

name: Kafra Storage Ticket
description: Kafra's special ticket can help adventurers open the Storage for free. When adventurers own this ticket, it will be used as priority. If you look carefully, Some vague words are written on the left bottom-"miss you."

name: Kafra Summer cone
description: Those friends who love to prank dumped the Cone on my head!! But I'm not mad at all, it was Soooo chill.
effect: Fire damage taken - 3%,Damage to Fire Monsters ＋3%
